mapper.select: select code, name from sidocode order by code
select * from guguncode where code like concat(#{sidoCode}, '%') and name is not null order by name
select * from dongcode where code like concat(#{gugunCode}, '%') and name is not null order by name

select * from (select * from dongcode d inner join (select hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, hi.dongCode, hd.dealAmount, hd.area, hd.dealYear, hd.dealMonth, hd.dealDay from houseinfo hi inner join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode ) as ht on ht.dongCode = d.code ) as view where view.dongCode = #{dongCode} and view.apartmentName like concat('%', #{aptText}, '%') order by dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc
